instructions.title: Feet
instructions.text: Curl your toes downward… hold… and relax.

instructions.title: Calves
instructions.text: Point your toes upward… hold… and relax.

instructions.title: Thighs
instructions.text: Squeeze your thigh muscles… hold… and relax.

instructions.title: Stomach
instructions.text: Tighten your stomach… hold… and let go.

instructions.title: Chest
instructions.text: Take a deep breath, tense… hold… and exhale.

instructions.title: Hands
instructions.text: Clench your fists… hold… and release.

instructions.title: Forearms
instructions.text: Tighten your forearms… hold… and relax.

instructions.title: Upper arms
instructions.text: Flex your arms… hold… and relax.

instructions.title: Shoulders
instructions.text: Shrug up to ears… hold… and drop.

instructions.title: Neck
instructions.text: Gently press head back… hold… and relax.
